item.title: LLMs: Stochastic Parrots ðŸ¦œ and How (Not) to Use Them
item.description: was written in a period when NLP practitioners are producing bigger (# of parameters; size of training data) language models (LMs), and pushing the top scores on benchmarks. A lot changed since mid-2021, when I initially wrote this page. OpenAI’s ChatGPT took the world by storm – reaching 123m MAU less than 3 months after launch and becoming the fastest-growing consumer application in history (TikTok took 9 months to hit 100m MAU).
